name: Oracle - Salomon
additionalNotes:
Crafted by the famous Plasencia family at their Plasencia Cigars S.A. cigar factory in Nicaragua. The Oracle cigars whose concept was to deliver a complex premium cigar with superb construction, and fabulous taste all for an affordable price. To provide a blend with such high expectations in mind, the 
A Cuban-seed Habano wrapper was chosen for this complex Nicaraguan puro blend that includes homegrown long filler leaves from Estelí, Ometepe, Jalapa and Condega— the four top growing regions in the country. Light an Oracle cigar, and you’ll quickly be greeted by captivating flavors of wood, pepper, earth, cinnamon, and black coffee, all delivered in a smooth medium bodied fashion. Available in three popular classic sizes, and the famed Solomon size, a stunning, hard to roll old world Figurado, Oracle cigars are poised to please your palate in a highly enjoyable way without putting a dent in your wallet. Order a box of these hot new premium cigars wherever you can find them, then, count on coming back for many more.
